entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this morning then cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
